name: FireKrackers
description:
FireKrackers is an arcade/puzzle game in which Your goal is to destroy all the blocks in the level in shortest time possible.

Adjacent blocks of the same kind can be chained. To chain Distant blocks, player can use "Chainer" item.
There are few kinds of obstacles present to make gameplay a little bit harder :D

You can earn up to 3 stars for completing a level. For stars You unlock new levels and "weapons" :)

There isn't too much to say about FK, You just have to play it :D


FK is a solo project of mine, I really hope You enjoy it :)
Music created by Serge Quadrado.
